title: [Upper Trollfang, Outside Inn]
description: The hills huddle close to the path here, a smallish formation of earth and gravel looming directly above you.  Its surface is divided into networks of rain-washed gullies and channels.  The hillock casts an ominous gloom upon the path and the old inn.

The hills huddle close to the path here, a smallish formation of earth and gravel looming directly above you.  Its surface is divided into networks of rain-washed gullies and channels.  The night casts a sinister darkness upon the path and the old inn.
